predictions.text: ERCOT system peak demand will set a new winter record at or above 80.0 GW by 2026-02-28 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirmation via ERCOT public data (hourly load) showing a winter-season peak >= 80.0 GW by the deadline.
monitoring_signals: NOAA/CPC outlooks for Arctic air outbreaks in TX
Data center interconnection updates and large-load notices
Natural gas-fired generation availability and outages
predictions.rationale: Rapid AI/data center load growth and potential cold snaps increase odds of a new winter peak.

predictions.text: Starlink will publicly file an S-1 registration statement with the U.S. SEC by 2026-03-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: A public S-1 or F-1 filing on SEC EDGAR for a Starlink IPO (not a confidential submission).
monitoring_signals: Reports of a Starlink tracking stock or spin-off
predictions.rationale: Reports indicate IPO preparation and a separation path; a near-term filing is plausible.

predictions.text: The DEA will publish a final rule in the Federal Register rescheduling marijuana to Schedule III by 2026-06-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: A DEA final rule in the Federal Register explicitly moving marijuana from Schedule I to Schedule III.
monitoring_signals: OIRA review status for DEA rule
DEA hearing timelines and comment responses
White House statements or DOJ guidance
Litigation that could delay rule finalization
predictions.rationale: Policy momentum and executive signals suggest resolution; timelines allow for process.

predictions.text: Coinbase will announce or launch a regulated prediction markets product integrated with Kalshi by 2026-02-28 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Official Coinbase announcement or product page detailing prediction markets via Kalshi integration, or Kalshi announcement naming Coinbase integration.
monitoring_signals: Coinbase blog and X account posts
Kalshi product updates and CFTC filings
Developer API documentation referencing markets integration
predictions.rationale: Reporting indicates imminent unveiling; technical and regulatory paths already exist.

predictions.text: NOAA SWPC will report at least one G4 (Severe) geomagnetic storm event by 2026-03-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: SWPC event reports or alerts indicating a G4 (Severe) geomagnetic storm within the period.
monitoring_signals: Sunspot number and 10.7 cm flux trends
Halo CME detections and Earth-directed CMEs
Solar cycle peak timing and active regions frequency
predictions.rationale: Solar Cycle 25 is near peak; severe storms are plausible but not baseline.

predictions.text: S&P CoreLogic Case-Shiller U.S. National Home Price Index (YoY, NSA) for October 2025 will print between -0.5% and +1.5%.
predictions.verification_criteria: Value as published in the official S&P CoreLogic Case-Shiller October 2025 news release.
predictions.rationale: Affordability headwinds and softening demand imply near-flat national YoY prices.

predictions.text: Freddie Mac PMMS 30-year fixed mortgage rate will print at or below 6.00% in at least one weekly survey by 2026-03-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Freddie Mac Primary Mortgage Market Survey weekly release showing the U.S. average 30-year fixed rate <= 6.00%.
monitoring_signals: U.S. 10-year Treasury yield and term premium
predictions.rationale: Easing inflation and prospective Fed cuts should pull mortgage rates toward 6%.

predictions.text: ICE Brent crude front-month futures will settle at or below $65.00 per barrel on at least one trading day by 2026-03-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: ICE settlement price for the front-month Brent contract at or below $65.00 on any trading day in the window.
monitoring_signals: Global growth indicators and demand revisions
predictions.rationale: Demand risks and ample non-OPEC supply create downside tail risk for crude prices.

predictions.text: NYMEX Henry Hub natural gas front-month futures will settle at or above $3.75 per MMBtu on at least one trading day by 2026-03-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: CME/NYMEX settlement for front-month Henry Hub at or above $3.75 per MMBtu within the period.
monitoring_signals: Heating degree days and cold outbreaks
predictions.rationale: Winter weather volatility, LNG demand, and potential supply hiccups can spike prompt gas.

predictions.text: S&P 500 Index (SPX) will close at least 10.0% below its all-time closing high on at least one trading day by 2026-03-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Using official S&P Dow Jones closing data, identify any close at or below 90% of the latest recorded all-time closing high by the deadline.
monitoring_signals: Credit spread widening and VIX spikes
Policy uncertainty around Fed leadership and rates
predictions.rationale: Concentration risk and AI multiple fragility elevate drawdown tail risk.

predictions.text: Google will publish a Chrome Stable Channel update in January 2026 acknowledging at least one security vulnerability that has been "actively exploited" in the wild.
predictions.verification_criteria: Chrome Releases blog or Chrome Stable notes in January 2026 contain language indicating at least one CVE was actively exploited.
monitoring_signals: Security researcher disclosures on V8/WebRTC/GPU bugs
predictions.rationale: Chrome frequently patches in-the-wild exploits; year-end holidays historically reveal carryover zero-days.
